timeline.bodyText: With the new approach, is this roundtrip via FDSM needed, as we already have the OCFile?
timeline.author: tobiasKaminsky

replies.bodyText:
OCFile in download status is part of the Request, so it's not updated.
DownloadStatus does not carry result OCFile, but this can be changed.
replies.author: ezaquarii

replies.bodyText: @tobiasKaminsky Downloaded OCFile is now exposed in the download status.
replies.author: ezaquarii
